attributes.name: Interviewee
attributes.contents:
### Who are you, and what do you do?

Good question.

### What hardware do you use?

A [laptop][] and a [phone][].

### And what software?

The best [image editor][image-editor] out there. And the best [text editor][text-editor].

### What would be your dream setup?

This is pretty much it.

[laptop]: http://www.example.com/laptop/ "A laptop."
[phone]: http://www.example.com/phone/ "A phone."
[image-editor]: http://www.example.com/image-editor/ "An image editor."
[text-editor]: http://www.example.com/text-editor/ "A text editor."
